text:
Company: Sanders and Sons

Role: Labor Relations Attorney

Company Background: Sanders and Sons is a reputable law firm specializing in labor relations and employment law. Our team is dedicated to providing comprehensive legal services to a diverse client base, ensuring fair and equitable workplace practices.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a qualified Labor Relations Attorney to join our team. This role involves managing labor relations matters, providing legal counsel on employment issues, and representing clients in various legal settings.

Responsibilities:
- Provide legal advice on labor relations and employment law matters.
- Represent clients in arbitration, mediation, and court proceedings.
- Draft and review employment contracts, policies, and other legal documents.
- Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations.
- Collaborate with internal teams to develop strategies for resolving labor disputes.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school.
- Admission to the bar in the relevant jurisdiction.
- Minimum of 5 years’ experience in labor relations or employment law.
- Strong analytical, negotiation, and communication skills.
- Ability to align with our company’s mission and values.
- Commitment to maintaining a professional look in accordance with company policy.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from USD 90,000 to USD 120,000, based on experience and skills.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Retirement savings plan with company match.
- Parking available for employees with mobility needs.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
- Professional development opportunities and continuing education support.
- Inclusive work environment where tattoos are permitted in line with company policy.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume, cover letter, and references to careers@sandersandsons.com with the subject line "Labor Relations Attorney Application".
